attributes.action: Allow the English people to choose, between the European Union or The United States, if a referendum is not given to them based on England being assimilated into the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English People are not being given the chance to decide upon their future! Plans are being drawn up to fragment their country into smaller regions! Is this grossly unfair! Therefore, I would rather be part of the United States rather than being under the tumb of the Europeans! Give us a referendum on the EU, or allow us the choice. This is not meant as a joke.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
